description.raw:
This PRs implements the first class structure that help to share jenkins configuration among all our jobs. It is based on an inheritance structure that defines configurations in different levels. For example, the Linux CI compilation jobs inherit properties from OSRFBase (mail and description) and OSRFLinux (ansi color, docker label, release tool checkout, ...).

```
               OSRFBase
                     |
               ----------------
              |
       OSRFLinux
              |
       ----------------
       |
OSRFLinuxCompilation
```

This allows to implement a mentor2 branch testing job with just [a few lines](#!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/new#chg-jenkins-scripts/dsl/mentor2.dsl).

Testing run: the [seed job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/_dsl_mentor2/), and the [generated job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-ci_mentor2_v2-trusty-amd64/).

       ----------------
       |
OSRFLinuxCompilation

This allows to implement a mentor2 branch testing job with just a few lines.

Testing run: the seed job, and the generated job.

title.raw: DSL classes for jenkins jobs - Mentor2 branch gazebo testing implementation
